name: .AFT
summary: Learn about .AFT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open an AFT file with Ancestry.com Family Tree Maker. However, the software is discontinued, and the program is no longer available.

If you have access to Family Tree Maker 2005 SE, you can convert it to an .FTM file and open it with version 2008 and later of Family Tree Maker (Software MacKiev acquired Family Tree Maker from ancestry.com in 2015).

You can convert an AFT file to an FTM file with Family Tree Maker 2005 SE. To convert the file, select File â†’ Open to open the AFT file, then follow the prompts to save it as a new working file (FTM file).
